headline: Is Accenture (ACN) Now An Opportunity After A 40.9% One Year Share Price Decline
summary: If you are wondering whether Accenture's current share price still reflects its long term potential, it becomes essential to look closely at what you are paying for each dollar of value. The stock closed at US$224.23 recently, with returns of a 6.8% decline over 7 days, 22.3% decline over 30 days, 13.7% decline year to date, 40.9% decline over 1 year, and 14.6% and 4.4% declines over 3 and 5 years respectively. These figures can change how investors think about both risk and...

headline: Accenture’s Dividend Won’t Wow You – But Maybe It Should
summary: Accenture just paid shareholders $1.63 per share on February 13, 2026, marking the latest installment in a 20+ year streak of consecutive annual dividend increases. But with the stock down 41% over the past year and trading at $224.08, investors need to look beyond the growth streak to understand whether this 2.6% yielder still deserves ... Accenture’s Dividend Won’t Wow You – But Maybe It Should
